select.id: select介護認定審査会割当情報ByKey

mapper.sql:
SELECT DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho.*, DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho.* FROM ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" WHERE "shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{shinsakaiKaisaiNo} AND "shinseishoKanriNo" = #{shinseishoKanriNo} ) AS DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" ) AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho ON DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho."dbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."dbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho_shinseishoKanriNo"

select.id: select介護認定審査会割当情報ByKey_審査順確定フラグ非一致

mapper.select:
SELECT DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho.*, DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho.* FROM ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" WHERE "shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{shinsakaiKaisaiNo} AND "shinseishoKanriNo" = #{shinseishoKanriNo} AND "shinsakaiOrderKakuteiFlag" != #{shinsakaiOrderKakuteiFlag} ) AS DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" ) AS DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho ON DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho."dbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho_shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho."dbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho_shinseishoKanriNo"

association.property: 介護認定審査会割当情報Entity
